data.taskTitle: Debug status idle vs completing bug
data.approach: Investigate how SessionCard determines session state vs status badge. The signal completing reaches the badge but not the header state.

data.taskTitle: Debug status idle vs completing bug
summary: Fixed sessionState to prioritize richSignalPayload.type for completing/completed/idle states
Extended TTL from 5 seconds to 60 seconds for signal-driven states
Added displayTask fallback to extract task info from signal payload when task prop is null
data.approach: The bug was caused by 5-second TTL expiring during long completion processes. Now richSignalPayload takes priority with 60s TTL.

filesModified.description: Fixed sessionState derivation and displayTask fallback

reviewFocus: Verify the 60s TTL is appropriate for all completion scenarios
Check that displayTask fallback correctly extracts task info from signals

summary: Debugged race condition in SessionCard state derivation
Fix prioritizes richSignalPayload.type for completing/completed/idle states with 60s TTL
Task info extracted from signal payload when Beads task is already closed
